query: I keep having negative thoughts that I can't get rid of. I think everyone hates me and I'll never be good enough.
I have trouble controlling my emotions. One minute I'm fine, and the next I'm furious or devastated.
I struggle with black and white thinking. Everything is either perfect or terrible, and I can't see the middle ground.
My anxiety makes me catastrophize. I always imagine the worst possible outcome for every situation.
I have a hard time in relationships. I'm terrified of abandonment and often push people away before they can leave me.
I keep procrastinating on important tasks because I'm afraid I'll fail at them.
When I'm upset, I often engage in impulsive behaviors that I later regret, like spending too much money or binge eating.
I'm constantly comparing myself to others on social media and feeling inadequate.
I need help with mindfulness techniques to stay present during stressful situations.
I need to challenge my irrational beliefs about needing to be perfect all the time.
I often feel overwhelmed by my emotions and struggle to regulate them. What can I do?
I'm constantly worried about what others think of me and feel like I'm not living up to expectations.
I have a hard time accepting myself and often engage in self-destructive behaviors.
I need help with managing my stress and anxiety levels. Can you suggest some techniques?
I'm experiencing high levels of stress at work and can't seem to focus on tasks.
My anxiety is causing me to avoid social situations completely.
I want to practice mindfulness to help regulate my emotions during conflicts.
I have trouble with anger management and often lash out at people I care about.
My thoughts race constantly and I can't turn off my mind to sleep.
I feel emotionally numb most of the time and can't connect with others.
I overthink every decision and get paralyzed by fear of making mistakes.
My moods change rapidly throughout the day for seemingly no reason.
